price: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi batinya Allah, iyo igishuko cya shitani kibagezeho, bibuka (Allah) maze bakaba maso (bakitandunya n’ibyaha).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَٰٓئِفٞ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ تَذَكَّرُواْ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ittaqaw idhā massahum ṭāifun mina al-shayṭāni tadhakkarū fa-idhā hum mub'ṣirūna
